testcase.name: Browser Autofill | PIN set | Valid PIN
testcase.summary: Validate that user can authenticate using browser autofill feature with correct PIN
testcase.preconditions:
• PIN is set
  • Connection: USB 
  • Multiple registrations on webauthn.io are done with security key under test

    START:  open Webauthn.io

step.actions: Leave the username textbox empty > Click the Authenticate button
step.expectedresults: A prompt to choose how you'd like to sign in to webauthn.io appears

step.actions: Select Use a passkey on different device
step.expectedresults:
Choose device with a passkey:
USB
Different device

step.actions: Connect the security key under test
step.expectedresults:
- LED blinks once (battery level)
- Confirm with PIN dialog opens

- LED is blinking BLUE
- Connect you key dialog opens

step.actions: Press the button on the device
step.expectedresults:
- LED stops blinking
- List of registered username appears
